description_field_1: Deltos is a lightweight, modular, and easy-to-use cloud service.
empty_drive_subtitle: Drag files here or click 'Upload' to add files
folder_create_description: Create a folder to organize your files. By creating folders, you can better manage and categorize your documents, images, and other important files.
login_subtitle: Sign in with your Deltos account
login_private_window: Not your computer? Use your browser's private mode to sign in securely.
login_error_message: Login failed. Please check your credentials and try again.
